ComicInfo.Summary:
Lady Death's new four part epic story begins here!
There are dire omens in the sky and the air is full of fear as the long, cold shadow of Sagos stretches across the Blacklands, growing darker with each passing night. Hope has renounced her humanity and she's sentenced to the labyrinth. Now forged into the cold, cruel and alluring warrior Lady Death, she joins forces with the mysterious and deadly Wargoth, and spellcaster Satasha. Together they dare the impossible: destroy Sagos, the realm-shattering warlock who has kidnapped Lady Death's mother's soul.
This issue introduced a major new villainess, STYGMATA! She lives in the blood.
